data.title: The world of Shaft: a complete guide to the novels, comic strip, films and television series 9780786499236, 9781476622231, 0786499230
data.meta_description: Mention Shaft and most people think of Gordon Parks' seminal 1971 film starring Richard Roundtree in a leather coat...
